60.5% {\n left: 12px;\n top: 12px;\n }\n 62.5% {\n left: 12px;\n top: 24px;\n }\n 73% {\n left: 12px;\n top: 24px;\n }\n 75% {\n left: 0;\n top: 24px;\n }\n 85.5% {\n left: 0;\n top: 24px;\n }\n 87.5% }\n 12.5% {\n left: 12px;\n top: 0;\n }\n 23% {\n left: 12px;\n top: 0;\n }\n 25% {\n left: 24px;\n top: 0;\n }\n 35.5% {\n left: 24px;\n top: 0;\n }\n 37.5% {\n left: 24px;\n top: 12px;\n }\n 48% {\n hue-rotate {\n 0% {\n -webkit-filter: hue-rotate(0deg);\n filter: hue-rotate(0deg);\n }\n 100% {\n -webkit-filter: hue-rotate(360deg);\n filter: hue-rotate(360deg);\n }\n}\n@keyframes hue-rotate {\n 0% {\n -webkit-filter: hue-rotate(0deg);\n filter: hue-rotate(0deg);\n }\n 100% {\n -webkit-filter: hue-rotate(360deg);\n filter: hue-rotate(360deg);\n }\n}\nbody {\n display: flex;\n height: 100vh;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n}\n\n.loading {\n position: relative;\n width: 36px;\n height: 36px;\n margin-top: 10px;\n margin-left: 10px;\n -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);\n transform: rotate(45deg);\n -webkit-animation: hue-rotate 10s linear infinite both;\n animation: hue-rotate 10s linear infinite both;\n}\n\n.loading__square {\n position: absolute;\n top: 0;\n left: 0;\n width: 10px;\n height: 10px;\n margin: 2px;\n border-radius: 1px;\n background: #07a;\n background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #fa0 40%, #0c9 60%);\n background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(#fa0, #fa0);\n background-size: cover;\n background-position: center;\n background-attachment: fixed;\n -webkit-animation: square-animation 10s ease-in-out infinite both;\n animation: square-animation 10s ease-in-out infinite both;\n}\n.loading__square:nth-of-type(0) {\n -webkit-animation-delay: 0s;\n animation-delay: 0s;\n}\n.loading__square:nth-of-type(1) {\n
